A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I honestly don't get the hate for this movie from many fans.  I grew up with the original trilogy and suffered through the prequels.  This wasn't a perfect movie by any stretch of the imagination but it was entertaining and to me\, fit just fine in the Star Wars universe.  

It is not an easy task to move past the iconic characters of the past but for the franchise to move forward it has to.

Will be interesting to see what JJ Abrams does with episode 9.
